inputs.text:
A small comic story shown in four panels arranged in a 2x2 grid.

Panel 1:
A young Indian college student sits at a desk late at night, looking worried at a laptop screen filled with code.
Clear white speech bubble above the character saying:
"This code should work… why is it failing?"

Panel 2:
The same student leans back in the chair, thinking deeply, with code and ideas floating lightly in the background.
Clear white speech bubble saying:
"Wait… I forgot the logic."

Panel 3:
The student types confidently on the laptop, smiling, with the screen glowing brighter.
Clear white speech bubble saying:
"Yes! That’s it!"

Panel 4:
Morning light enters the room. The student looks proud, holding a coffee cup, laptop showing success.
Clear white speech bubble saying:
"My comic AI is finally working."

Art style:
Clean modern digital comic illustration.
Bold black outlines.
Simple smooth shading.
Vibrant but balanced colors.
Consistent character appearance across all panels.
Not photorealistic, clearly illustrated.

Layout:
Clear panel borders.
Speech bubbles fully inside panels.
Text is large, centered, and easy to read.

Camera:
Medium shots, straight-on view.

Lighting:
Soft indoor lighting at night, warm morning light in final panel.

Mood:
Relatable, hopeful, tech-focused.
High detail, sharp focus.
